gololang.concurrent.workers

Class WorkerEnvironment.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • gololang.concurrent.workers.WorkerEnvironment.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    WorkerEnvironment

    public static class WorkerEnvironment.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    Worker environment builder objects exist mostly to provide a good-looking API in Golo.

        See Also:

      • withFixedThreadPool

        public WorkerEnvironment withFixedThreadPool(int size)
        Parameters:
        size - the thread pool size.
        Returns:
        a worker environment with a fixed-size thread pool.
        See Also:
        Executors.newFixedThreadPool(int)

      • withFixedThreadPool

        public WorkerEnvironment withFixedThreadPool()
        Returns:
        a worker environment with a fixed-size thread pool in the number of available processors.
        See Also:
        Executors.newFixedThreadPool(int), Runtime.availableProcessors()

      • withSingleThreadExecutor

        public WorkerEnvironment withSingleThreadExecutor()
        Returns:
        a worker environment with a single executor thread.
